law.text: A quorum of the board shall consist of at least three (3) members. The concurring votes of three (3) members shall be considered as the action of the board.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 90, sec. 13, effective July 15, 2014. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 296, sec. 4, effective April 9, 1988. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 287, sec. 20.
